activities:
Centercode collects certain contact information from visitors to our website should they request information regarding the company or our products. In addition, should they choose to purchase products, we request additional information.

The Privacy Policy has been in effect since 2007, and updated with the Safe Harbor provisions in 2011 as we prepare to do business with European firms.
